data.title: Pooja Sharma Major Project
data.meta_description: Pooja Sharma major project - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is a major research project submitted to Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya, Indore for an MBA degree. It examines the job satisfaction levels of employees at HDFC Bank in Delhi. The introduction provides background on the importance of employee satisfaction and loyalty in building organizational success. It discusses factors that influence employee retention such as work satisfaction, opportunities for growth, and work-life balance. The study aims to understand job satisfaction levels at HDFC Bank and provide recommendations to improve satisfaction. The literature review and research methodology sections outline how previous studies and the current study's survey approach will be used to analyze satisfaction.
